title: Part a.
stimulusHtml:
2 points (Inward shift in the money supply and an increase in the interest rate)

  • 1 point: Correct money market graph with properly labeled axes:

    • Labeled x-axis

    • Labeled y-axis

    • Ms curve

    • Md curve

  • 1 point: Inward shift in money supply and a higher interest rate:

    • Ms shift left

    • Interest rate increase
descriptions:
No points earned. (Inward shift in the money supply and an increase in the interest rate)

  • 1 point: Correct money market graph with properly labeled axes:

    • Labeled x-axis

    • Labeled y-axis

    • Ms curve

    • Md curve

  • 1 point: Inward shift in money supply and a higher interest rate:

    • Ms shift left

    • Interest rate increase

Earns 1 of 2 points (Inward shift in the money supply and an increase in the interest rate)

    • Labeled x-axis

    • Labeled y-axis

    • Ms curve

    • Md curve

  • 1 point: Inward shift in money supply and a higher interest rate:

    • Ms shift left

    • Interest rate increase

Earns 2 of 2 points (Inward shift in the money supply and an increase in the interest rate)

title: Part b.
stimulusHtml:
3 points

  • 1 point-C: Decrease linked graphically or with explanation (not assertion) to interest sensitivity.

  • 1 point-I: Decrease linked graphically or with explanation (not assertion) to interest sensitivity.

  • 1 point-G: Student expected to respond using automatic effects only: No change in G, or G decreases because cost of new borrowing increases.
descriptions:

title: Part c.
stimulusHtml:
2 points (AD shifts in: Real income decreases and price level falls)

  • 1 point: Correctly labeled AD/AS graph

  • 1 point: Correct inward shift in AD and impact on real income (decrease) and price level (decrease)
descriptions:
No points earned (AD shifts in: Real income decreases and price level falls)

  • 1 point: Correctly labeled AD/AS graph

  • 1 point: Correct inward shift in AD and impact on real income (decrease) and price level (decrease)

Earns 1 of 2 points (AD shifts in: Real income decreases and price level falls)

  • 1 point: Correctly labeled AD/AS graph

  • 1 point: Correct inward shift in AD and impact on real income (decrease) and price level (decrease)

Earns 2 of 2 points (AD shifts in: Real income decreases and price level falls)
